name: TOWERSCAPE TRACK 2
description:
It's been a week since you opened the Great Door.

Your ascent is still far from over.

TOWERSCAPE TRACK 2 is the direct sequel to TOWERSCAPE. It's a multi-track linear narrative game, meaning the only choices you will make is which character's POV to follow. Play multiple times to see what each character is thinking.

It is recommended you play TOWERSCAPE first before playing this game.
